decision_conditions: The proposed  first floor side and rear extension  by virtue of their scale, mass,  height, design  and roof form would be  considered a bulky and incongruous addition to the host dwelling and would not be considered to be subordinate nor proportionate.  It is considered that the proposals that would be visually intrusive and detract from the character and  appearance of the host property and  the wider area.The proposal would not accord with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), and CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012) and the Residential Design SPD (2013)

When viewed from neighbouring properties  the additional bulk, mass and height it is considered that the proposed development would have an unacceptable adverse impact upon the amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties by reason of overbearing appearance.The proposal would not accord with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), and CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012) and the Residential Design SPD (2013)
description: Erection of hip to gable roof extension and first-floor side and rear extension.
